messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
What type of account would you like me to make for you?
messages.user_message: Please create a retirement fund account.

messages.agent_message: Ok. Your new account was created, but you need to transfer some funds into this new account to open it. If you specify an account, I can transfer a small amount of funds from that to your new account.
Which account would you like to use?
A retirement fund account was successfully created with starter funds transferred from savings.
Would you like to send any funds to a contact today?
Alright, who would you like to send funds to and how much?
Which account would you like to select for this task?
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
messages.user_message: I want to pay off my mortgage payment.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to select for this task?
messages.user_message: I want to use savings for this.

messages.agent_message: Paying your mortgage bill from your savings account...
Would you like to request that one of your contacts sends money to you?
Ok! I won't request money from any of your contacts today.
Would you like to transfer funds between accounts now?
Ok! Please specify the funds you which to transfer and the accounts to transfer between.
messages.user_message: I want to send 7 to college fund from chequing.

messages.agent_message: 7 were transferred from chequing to college fund.
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
